techmeme.title: Norwegian payment service Vipps launches the world's first alternative to Apple Pay on iPhone, following Apple's move to open up NFC access to devs in iOS 18.1 (Tim Hardwick/MacRumors)
Oracle reports Q2 revenue up 9% YoY to $14.06B, vs. $14.1B est., says it made a deal with Meta for training Llama models on its cloud; ORCL down 6%+ after hours (Jonathan Vanian/CNBC)
OpenAI says the depiction of minors is limited with Sora, and only a "subset" of users can create videos of a real person using uploaded footage of that person (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
In a mockup posted on GitHub, Bluesky teases Bluesky+, a $8 per month paid subscription offering profile customizations, higher video upload limits, and more (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
OpenAI launches Sora, available as part of ChatGPT Plus, letting users generate up to 50 videos at 480p or fewer videos at 720p each month, in select countries (OpenAI)
